title: Tina
description:
Tig and Cheryl face the music as they delve into Tina Turner's tell-all doc, "Tina"! Available on HBO/HBO Max, "Tina" tells the story of the life and times of the legendary '80s rocker. Along the way, Cheryl ponders the popularity of British band "Bucks Fizz," Tig walks us through her sweat preferences, and "who were you attracted to" yields interesting results! *this episode spills beans* (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
